price: Say, “I have no power to harm or benefit you[11].”
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا
footnotes: [11] i.e., grant you goodness and guidance.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
